hero.title: Build Smarter Web Apps with AI
hero.description: A modern Next.js template with built-in AI capabilities, development tools, and best practices for building scalable web applications.

agentic.title: Agentic Development Framework
agentic.subtitle: for Cursor IDE

benefits.title: Key Benefits
benefits.standards: Enforced coding standards and best practices

meta.title: AI-Powered Next.js Template | Modern Web Development
meta.description: A modern Next.js template with built-in AI capabilities, Supabase integration, and development tools for building scalable web applications.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.description: A comprehensive set of tools and features to accelerate your development workflow.

ai.title: AI Integration
ai.description: Built-in AI capabilities with Google Gemini, Recraft, and Tavily APIs for content generation, image creation, and intelligent search.

tools.title: Development Tools
tools.description: Modern development tools for image optimization, HTML to Markdown conversion, and efficient file management.

database.title: Database & Auth
database.description: Seamless Supabase integration for authentication, real-time data, and secure API endpoints.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Built-in support for multiple languages with next-intl and efficient translation management.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Optimized for speed with server components, edge functions, and efficient caching strategies.

security.title: Security
security.description: Best practices for secure authentication, API protection, and data handling.

coreFeatures.title: Core Features
coreFeatures.description: Everything you need to build a full-featured web application

auth.title: Authentication & Users
auth.description: Complete user management system with Supabase Auth integration, social providers, protected routes, and role-based access control.

content.title: Content Management
content.description: Comprehensive content management with AI assistance for content creation and optimization.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Built-in support for multiple languages and content localization.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Track and analyze user behavior and application performance.

booking.title: Booking System
booking.description: Complete appointment scheduling system with calendar management.

realtime.title: Real-time Features
realtime.description: Live updates and collaborative features powered by Supabase.

technical.title: Technical Features
technical.description: Built with modern technologies and best practices.
